author: RedBill
title: Nice parts and value for money
review:
Box/Instructions

Easy but cheap plastic bag. Quite the size though, compared to the prize. Very clear instruction, easy to follow.

Parts

Very cool and sometimes even rare parts. Most of them very usable in own models you may want to build. A lot of parts for the size of the model. Big plus.

Minifigures

None

The build

Easy enough. Nothing to it.

The completed model

Looks nice, doesn't fall apart very easy. Just the stuff on the backside (handle etc.) is too big for the rest of the truck.

Overall opinion

Good fun and value for money.
